insert into OPERATION (operApplyNo, operPrice, operEndReg, requesterNo, operatorNo, brdNo) values (#{operApplyNo},#{operPrice},#{operEndReg},#{requesterNo},#{operatorNo},#{brdNo})
SELECT operNo from OPERATION where operNo = LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select bo.*,oper.* from BOARD bo left join OPERATION oper on bo.brdNo=oper.brdNo order by bo.brdNo
select * from OPERATION where operatorNo=#{userNo} order by operStartReg desc
select * from OPERATION where requesterNo=#{userNo} order by operStartReg desc
